sentences.sContent: Jason Kidd was once a gifted malcontent who essentially quit on the Nets to get himself traded to Dallas.
sentences.sContent_eng: Jason Kidd was once a gifted malcontent who essentially quit on the Nets to get himself traded to Dallas.
sentences.sCn: 贾森·基德在篮网队效力时表现出了不满的情绪，最后主动要求交易到小牛队。

sentences.sContent: Very public notice by employees will likely continue, with younger workers more apt to broadcast their malcontent, workplace experts say.
sentences.sContent_eng: Very public notice by employees will likely continue, with younger workers more apt to broadcast their malcontent, workplace experts say.
sentences.sCn: 一位职场专家认为，随着年轻雇员更倾向于发泄出他们的不满，更多的辞职秀会上演。

sentences.sContent: Very public notice by employees will likely continue, with younger workers more apt to broadcast their malcontent, workplace experts say.
sentences.sContent_eng: Very public notice by employees will likely continue, with younger workers more apt to broadcast their malcontent, workplace experts say.
sentences.sCn: 随着年轻的雇员们越来越倾向将自己不满宣泄出来，公开的辞职声明会继续下去，职场专家如是说。
